alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Graves; Marshall (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:32PM EDT until March 31 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Calloway County in western Kentucky... Southeastern Marshall County in western Kentucky... Southeastern Graves County in western Kentucky... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 932 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lynnville, or 12 miles southwest of Murray, moving northeast at 90 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murray, Lynnville, Hardin, Hazel, Aurora, Harris Grove and Crossland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western Kentucky. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for western Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
